mapper.select: SELECT r.*, h.id hostId, h.nickName hostName, a.id awayId, a.nickName awayName FROM roomInfo r LEFT JOIN user h ON r.hostId = h.id LEFT JOIN user a ON r.awayId = a.id WHERE r.id = #{ id }
SELECT r.*, h.id hostId, h.nickName hostName, a.id awayId, a.nickName awayName FROM roomInfo r LEFT JOIN user h ON r.hostId = h.id LEFT JOIN user a ON r.awayId = a.id WHERE r.hostId = #{ hostId }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomInfo(roomName, hostId, level) VALUES (#{roomName}, #{hostId}, #{level})
